      • toggleInversion

        public void toggleInversion()
        Toggle direction of robot drive by inverting motor directions Left side inverted (default) is Collector forward Right side inverted is Gear Loader forward

      • setInversionForward

        public void setInversionForward()
        Set direction to forward (left inverted) Left side inverted (default) is Collector forward Right side inverted is Gear Loader forward

      • setInversionBackward

        public void setInversionBackward()
        Set direction to inverted (right inverted) Left side inverted (default) is Collector forward Right side inverted is Gear Loader forward

      • manualDrive

        public void manualDrive(double translateX,
                        double translateY,
                        double rotate)
        Manual Cartesian Drive
        Parameters:
        translateX - Generally the (normalized) X input of a gamepad, [-1, 1] Positive values correspond to translation to the right
        translateY - Generally the (normalized) Y input of a gamepad, [-1, 1] Negative values correspond to translation forward
        rotate - Generally the (normalized) X input of a gamepad (right stick), [-1, 1] Positive values correspond to rotation to the right

      • moveToTargetAngle

        public void moveToTargetAngle()
        Motor update based on gyroscope PID output Updates motors solely based off of gyroscope PID Controller in order to reach an angular setpoint

      • moveWithGyroPID

        public void moveWithGyroPID(double translateX,
                            double translateY)
        Gyroscope PID Assisted Drive Updates motors using provided translation input and gyroscope PID Controller to maintain an angular position while translating.
        Parameters:
        translateX - Generally the (normalized) X input of a gamepad, [-1, 1] Positive values correspond to translation to the right
        translateY - Generally the (normalized) Y input of a gamepad, [-1, 1] Negative values correspond to translation forward

        Accelerometer PID Drive Updates motors with accelerometer PID controller output
